name: Search repositories
description: Find repositories via various criteria. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search keywords, as well as any qualifiers.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. One of `stars`, `forks`, or `updated`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if `sort` parameter is provided. One of `asc` or `desc`.

name: Search commits
description: Find commits via various criteria. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search terms.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. Can be `author-date` or `committer-date`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if `sort` parameter is provided. One of `asc` or `desc`.

name: Search code
description: Find file contents via various criteria. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search terms.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. Can only be `indexed`, which indicates how recently a file has been indexed by the GitHub search infrastructure.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if `sort` parameter is provided. One of `asc` or `desc`.

name: Search issues
description: Find issues by state and keyword. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search terms.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. Can be `comments`, `created`, or `updated`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if `sort` parameter is provided. One of `asc` or `desc`.

name: Search users
description: Find users via various criteria. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search terms.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. Can be `followers`, `repositories`, or `joined`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if `sort` parameter is provided. One of `asc` or `desc`.

name: Search topics
description: Find topics via various criteria. This method returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: q
params.description: The search terms.

name: Search labels
description: Find labels in a repository with names or descriptions that match search keywords. Returns up to 100 results [per page](/v3/#pagination).

params.name: repository_id
params.description: The id of the repository.

params.name: q
params.description: The search keywords.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. Can be one of `created` or `updated`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort order if the sort parameter is provided. Can be one of `asc` or `desc`.
